author: A_Brickset_user
review:
Like all pre-1984 promotional Lego ferries this one seems to be extremely rare. 
Nevertheless when I got this set in 2002, I was surprised to find it neither 
included in the internet data bases nor mentioned on any website.
This ferry is very similar to set 1656. It´s a model of the Viking Line ferries
"Viking Saga" and "Viking Song", which are no longer part of the Swedish-Finnish
Viking Line fleet today.
Though most of the windows are printed on the bricks, this set comes with the 
unbelieveable number of 21 stickers, plus 2 for the alternate ship´s name. So it 
will be very hard for collectors to get it complete.
A 4x4 sticker for a heliport on top of the ship and a sticker for the stern door 
are particularly worth mentioning.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: Amazing lego set!
review:
I got this set from a friend many years ago. The problem is that I do not have the instruction, and for some reason I took it apart a few years ago. If somebody has the instruction please e-mail me so I can put this one together again. 
email: martin_pettersson@spray.se

/Martin
